sentences.sentence: Fish and whales are examples of _____ animals.
The _____ passed a new law to help protect marine life.
The Earth's _____ keeps increasing as more people are born.
A _____ can keep children safe and guide them in life.
A _____ is when two vehicles crash into each other.
Vietnam is known for its tropical and humid _____.
The little village feared the _____ who lived at the top of the hill.
If you _____ someone, you look up to them with great respect.
When you are sick, your parents always _____ and care for you.
Scientists _____ the number of whales by counting them as they migrate.
A ship can transport many _____ of food across the sea.
Clean oceans are essential for the _____ of countless creatures.
Engine _____ from cars cause a lot of air pollution in big cities.
_____ in the ocean threatens the lives of many animals.
During times of war, many people suffered and died from _____.
If we do not protect rare species, they may face _____.
A forest or river can be a perfect _____ for wild animals.
Because lemon juice is _____, it tastes very sour.
We went for a walk along the _____ to see the beautiful ocean view.
The science _____ explained how climate change affects whales.
After the tunnel collapsed, the workers were _____ underground for hours.
Farmers use _____ to help crops grow healthy and strong.
_____ are tiny plants in the ocean that provide food for many fish.
Leaves _____ sunlight and turn it into energy for the plant.
Each of us is _____ for keeping our classroom clean every day.
